record.title: AUTHORITY FOR COMMITTEES TO MEET
record.narrative:
AUTHORITY FOR COMMITTEES TO MEET -- (Senate - December 11, 2008)

[Page: S10957]

speaking.topic: COMMITTEE ON HOMELAND SECURITY AND GOVERNMENTAL AFFAIRS
speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs be authorized to meet during the session of the Senate on Thursday, December 11, 2008, at 10 a.m. to conduct a hearing entitled "World at Risk: A Report from the Commission on the Prevention of Weapons of Mass Destruction Proliferation and Terrorism."

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
